dcterms:description: A dataset generated using the Interactive Gibson Simulator (iGibson) that focuses on robot interaction with indoor objects, capturing 1,000 scenes lasting 10 timesteps each, with various toys among the furniture.
dcterms:title: IGPLAY

dcterms:creator: F. Xia
W. B. Shen
C. Li
P. Kasimbeg
M. E. Tchapmi
A. Toshev
R. Martín-Martín
S. Savarese
dcterms:description: A dataset generated using the Interactive Gibson Simulator (iGibson) that focuses on robot social navigation with other dynamic agents in scenes, capturing 600 scenes lasting 10 timesteps each, with several robots moving around.
dcterms:title: IGNAV

dcterms:creator: J. Behley
M. Garbade
A. Milioto
J. Quenzel
S. Behnke
C. Stachniss
J. Gall
dcterms:description: A large-scale outdoor dataset collected by autonomous cars, suitable for evaluating semantic scene understanding and completion tasks.
dcterms:title: SemanticKITTI
